meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or practicing polyamory.
meanings.sent1: She is in a polyamorous relationship with two partners.
meanings.sent2: Their polyamorous lifestyle allows them to love more than one person.
meanings.sent3: In their polyamorous community, love knows no bounds.
meanings.sent4: The concept of polyamorous relationships challenges traditional norms.
meanings.sent5: Being polyamorous means embracing love in all its forms.

meanings.definition: Involving multiple romantic or sexual relationships with the knowledge and consent of all parties involved.
meanings.sent1: John and Mary have a polyamorous arrangement with their partners.
meanings.sent2: The polyamorous nature of their relationship requires open communication.
meanings.sent3: Their polyamorous adventures always keep things interesting.
meanings.sent4: The idea of polyamorous connections can be liberating for some.
meanings.sent5: Living a polyamorous life demands honesty and respect for all partners.
